text: Lindsay Davenport was the defending champion, but lost in the final against Venus Williams in their third consecutive final at this tournament. The score was 6–1, 6–4. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== ==External links== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Singles Bank of the West Classic - Singles
title: 2000 Bank of the West Classic – Singles
